member.name: M:KdajBi.API.Controllers.PublicBookingController.Get(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Get a list of available timeSlots for a specified date For each workplace: get available schedule, divide it by service duration, get events for that day and remove busy slots Finnaly return only distinct timeslots
member.param: Workplace Id or 0 if not specified

member.name: M:KdajBi.API.Controllers.PublicBookingController.getWorkplaceWorkhours(KdajBi.Core.Models.Workplace,System.DateTime)
member.summary: returns workplace working schedule for a date specified in the following order: 1. p_workplace.WorkplaceScheduleException 2. p_workplace.Schedule 3. p_workplace.Location.Schedule
